entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text:
@realDonaldTrump @fema Remember the ad from a few years ago, when the @GOP
 wanted to cut Medicare, showing a guy in suit/tie rolling a old lady in a wheelchair off a cliff?
Republicans faked outrage.
Now RWNJ's want to spread COVID19 really fast w/o social distancing.
Really trying to kill grandma/pa! https://t.co/enUfbAjkID
